blogs.title: A lone Georgian word in a Greek manuscript
blogs.summary: It doesn’t take long studying manuscripts before you learn that straightforward categories like genre, language, and even script are not always uniform across an individual manuscript’s contents. And when we include in those contents the eviden

author.name: hmmlorientalia
author.description: Some remarks—often with photos!—about manuscripts and the languages, literature, scholarship, and history of Christian culture in the Middle East.
